entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -37.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32 with temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 32 with temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
